name: neutralizing-gas

effect.sword_shield: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.the_crown_tundra: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.legends_arceus: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

short_effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text.sword_shield: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
